name: Go Pong Yourself
description:
A cyberpunk arcade pong style card game with sim elements. You play as a prisoner uses their life sentence as bargaining chips.

Prototype created for the Github GameJam 2018. 

Theme - Hybrid.

Unfortunately I wasn't able to work on it as much as I was hoping for this month but I put in as much work as I could. I am determined to continue on this project and this is between a bare bones prototype and something that could constitute as an alpha stage (hopefully in the next month). If you have any feedback please let me know in the comment below.

Gameplay:

The player has health points and warp points. Warp points are gained by bouncing the ball. You use them to play card onto the field. The cards have numbers and names specifying how many warp point they need to be played and what there name is. If you hover over a card a description should pop up in the top left. 

You can do "critical hits" by hitting the ball on the edge of your paddle.
